Knitpickr

Rails API, React front end with Redux state manager

This web application uses a Ruby on Rails API backend, PostGreSQL database, and a JavaScript-based React/Redux user interface to track projects and materials needed for a userâ€™s knitting/crochet/macrame projects.

  • Github

AdventureApp

Basic Rails application with User Authentication

This Rails web app allows users to go on an adventure, starring as the hero. Create, edit, update, and delete adventures featuring villains from popular franchises and organizations, including Harry Potter, Star Wars, and the Marvel Cinematic Universe. Search for a particular villain or franchise by name to access information more quickly.

  • Github

CoffeeShop App

A simple Rails application

A Rails web app that enables users to create customized coffee orders containing multiple specialty coffee drinks. Users can update, favorite, and delete orders to customize their preferences.

  • Github

Audrey Jones

Junior software engineer walking the line between art and science and hungry for new challenges!

    Did you know?

  • I use crochet as a meditative practice. Using videos on Youtube and following (and initially failing) at patterns I found online, I practiced basic crochet techniques until I got it right!
  • I am a classically-trained visual artist! She attended the Young Peoples' Studios at MICA from ages 2 - 13. She continues to do life drawing and portraits to this day.
  • I swim on a nearly-daily basis, doing resistance training in the pool to stay in shape.
  • My favorite food currently is poke! I've always loved sushi, but when it comes in a bowl and with extra spicy mayo and nori flakes on top, it becomes the ultimate meal!
